name: Ghostbusters equipment technician demo
summary: Help the ghostbusters by building the famous Proton Pack in this story driven puzzle game with the goal to build the last proton pack from spare parts around the basement of the Firehouse.  we find out from the workbenches AI assistant Called ADA "E.G.O.N 2" that the ghostbuster and the gear have been captured and you will have to search and solve puzzles to find all the parts to build the last pack to save them.
